author: openlittermap
title: Gamifying Littercoin
description: Using OpenLitterMap is uneventful & missing a captivating gaming experience. We need a better gaming experience to achieve mass adoption
solution: We are turning cleaning the planet into a game. This is completed by data collection competitions for schools eg LitterWeek coming 2022
experience: 12+ years independent R+D developing openlittermap.com. Littercoin idea born in 2015 after MSc. First funding on Project Catalyst in Fund 4.
